name: Fleet, Mythic

sections.body: Your base land speed increases by 5 feet, regardless of what armor you wear or whether you're encumbered. This bonus stacks with the bonus gained from Fleet.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: You can take this feat multiple times, but no more than the number of times you've taken non-mythic Fleet. The effects stack.
sections.name: Special

description: You're fantastically light on your feet.
